original_text: And the sons of Aaron presented the blood to him, and he dipped his finger in the blood and put it on the horns of the altar and poured out the blood at the base of the altar.
korean_text: 아론의 아들들이 그 피를 아론에게 가져오니 아론이 손가락으로 그 피를 찍어 제단 뿔들에 바르고 그 피는 제단 밑에 쏟고

sentences.original_text: And the sons of Aaron presented the blood to him
and he dipped his finger in the blood
and put it on the horns of the altar
and poured out the blood at the base of the altar
